title: Blended Course for Augmented Reality Game-Based English Learning Outcomes

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English conversation and grammar comprehension (intermediate level)
context.additional_context: Emphasizing work-related English proficiency for in-service practitioners

learning_goals: Learners achieve 80% accuracy in utilizing 200 professional English vocabulary terms required in work environments through augmented reality games
Learners maintain natural English conversations for five or more minutes during role-playing with peers through game-based activities
Learners achieve satisfaction scores of 4.0/5.0 or higher in learning engagement surveys by applying the ARCS motivation model
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
